text: If the white man wants to live in peace with the Indian he can live in peace.
author: Chief Joseph

text: I think that a strong Israel is the only Israel that will bring the Arabs to the peace table.
author: Benjamin Netanyahu

text: The only peace is being out of earshot.
author: Mason Cooley

text: In South Africa, we could not have achieved our freedom and just peace without the help of people around the world, who through the use of non-violent means, such as boycotts and divestment, encouraged their governments and other corporate actors to reverse decades-long support for the Apartheid regime.
author: Desmond Tutu

text: Bloody Christmas, here again, let us raise a loving cup, peace on earth, goodwill to men, and make them do the washing up.
author: Wendy Cope
